name: Nell's Wizard Adventure (EhMeal, mirsartandstuff, xXDabmaster2000Xx)
description:
"I can make it! Just watch me."

Nell, a wizard-in-training, is eager to prove they can make it out into the dangerous forests on their own. Help them go as far as they can, and use potions to demolish the obstacles in your way!

. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

Nell's Wizard Adventure is an endless runner developed for UCSC's AGPM 120 series in Spring 2021. This game was made using the Phaser framework, with custom assets, music, and designs.

Development Team: Emil Saechao, Miriam Perez, Naman Bhushan, Paul Lee
